headline: Best Stock to Buy Right Now: Coca-Cola vs. PepsiCo
summary: Coca-Cola (NYSE: KO) and PepsiCo (NASDAQ: PEP) have a long-standing rivalry as each has battled for the hearts, minds, and wallets of consumers.  Stock analysis may not have the entertainment value of the companies' commercials, but which one, Coca-Cola or PepsiCo, deserves your investment dollars?  Coca-Cola started selling its namesake brand in 1886, and it remains a pure beverage company.

headline: Coca-Cola Is Reliable, but 1 Thing Makes PepsiCo the Smarter Buy for Income Investors
summary: Dividend King Coca-Cola (NYSE: KO) is a consumer staples giant that fits that bill.  Coca-Cola owns one of the most recognized brands in the world, with lots going for it.  There's a reason why Warren Buffett has owned Coca-Cola within Berkshire Hathaway for decades.
